ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Air
ygData.msgSnippet: This zone is really a ton of fun. The monsters are really tough, but it s like a picnic, low lag, everyone just getting together and having a good time. You
ygData.messageBody:
This zone is really a ton of fun. The monsters are really tough, but
it's like a picnic, low lag, everyone just getting together and having a
good time. You put 60 people together in Fear and it's lagged badly and
people sqaubble, Air was just great.

Got to love how everything cons red to a L50, and boy is it freaky when
a harpy claws you for 375 in a single attack. ;)

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

Dark wrote:
>
> From: "Dark" <jackal@...>
>
> This zone is extremly tough especially as you go higher. It's for the
> expansion and Verant just gave us proof that they are raising the
> level cap.
> This zone makes fear look like a newbie zone.
>
> Naeeldar
>
